title: Restraint
description: Michael's been a prostitute since he was fourteen. The money's good, for sure, but that isn't really why he does it. Sex is all he ever thinks about, anyway—sex, and love, just getting to be close to someone—anyone, but it's not that he's addicted to sex like some people say. Maybe it’s because his dad never hugged him—barely ever even talked to him after his mom died—and his sisters were never nice to him, either, but whatever the reason, he likes his life just how it is, so it's pretty annoying that everyone he knows is trying to get him to give up hooking and get a regular job now that he's eighteen like he kept promising them he would. Then, two new customers come into his life and he begins to realize nothing will ever be the same again ....
author: December Nolan
